DOC.brief_summary: The study assess safety efficacy intravenous ( 10mg/kg ) subcutaneous ( 300mg ) secukinumab moderate severe chronic plaque-type psoriasis partial responder secukinumab .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Intravenous Subcutaneous Secukinumab Moderate Severe Chronic Plaque-type Psoriasis
